system.effect:
Trigger - Your Fire-Type Pokémon
Effect: While this Feature is Bound, the target gains the Mixed Power Poké Edge effect when using damaging Fire-Type Attacks. If the target already has Mixed Power, they instead add their entire Attack and Special Attack Stats to all damaging Fire-Type Attacks, instead of one or the other. This does not stack with Twisted Power.
system.prerequisites: Brightest Flame, Type-Linked Skill at Expert
system.name: Incandescence
